data.product: Name Puzzle 1st Christmas Gift Personalized Busy Board Baby Gift First Birthday Baby Boy Girl Toddler Custom Wooden Puzzle
data.description:
Personalized Wooden Busy Board with Name Puzzle is a great gift for baby boy or baby girl First Birthday, 1st Christmas, Baby shower.

Busy Board with Name Puzzle is a great idea to turn the process of learning letters into a play!

Sensory board improves fine motor skills, babies play with new objects, shapes, colors and studies them, it helps to develop logic, memory, finger grip and attention.

Our Name Puzzle made from non-toxic high quality plywood, we carefully polish every detail, the pegs for letters and shapes are mounted very securely for the safety of your baby! (PEGS ARE INCLUDED IN THE PRICE)

For painting we use safe Certified water based paint, the color can be chosen from the proposed options.

📌Approximate Dimensions 📌
*Length: 14.57 inches (37 cm)
*Height:  9 inches (23 cm)

The specified sizes refer to a puzzle up to 6-7 letters. The size of your puzzle will depend on the number of letters in your child's name. If the name has more than 6-7 letters, the size of the board will be increased.

* The base of the board is 0.35 inches thin (9 mm) and each letter is 0.24 inches thin (6 mm) and  2.44 inches tall (62 mm).

IF IN YOUR PUZZLE YOU HAVE LETTER ”I” - BE ATTENTIVE. THIS SHAPES CAN BE DANGEROUS FOR KIDS 0-3. DON’T LEAVE YOUR CHILD ALONE,  Instead - play with your kid and collect memories 😊

Custom Crayons - Crayon Name Set for Kids, Alphabet Name Crayons in a Gift Box, Crayon Toy, Birthday Gift Kids, Holiday Stocking Stuffer

Rainbow crayons are the perfect addition to your holiday gift idea for the family and custom art supplies for kids. Make your birthday presents pop with color with our personalized crayons! If you are a teacher looking for a holiday present for students, a custom crayon name set is a colorful surprise.

Our high-quality, best-selling Original Rainbow Crayon® Name Sets are the perfect birthday, thank you, or stocking stuffer!  We ship fast with FREE domestic shipping on orders $35 or over!

The Original Rainbow Crayon® was the first shop to create a personalized crayon name set and have been a part of the Etsy community since 2007.

As Seen In:
*Magnolia Journal
*Martha Stewart
*Business Insider
*The Washington Post
*NBC News
*Forbes
*The Drew Barrymore Show
*Etsy Design Awards Finalist- Kids Category
*Good Morning America
*Today
*USA Today
*Redbook Magazine
*Midwest Living
*US WEEKLY
*Best Products
*People
*Buzzfeed
*Southern Living
*Parents Canada
*Cool Mom Picks
*Today's Bride
and more!

This listing is for 1-4 Rainbow Crayon letters in a gift box with the name or word stamped on the front of the box. Additional letters can be added when checking out from the drop down menu.

**PLEASE READ ALL INFORMATION BELOW FOR BOX SIZES v. NAME SIZES. There are 3 different sizes of boxes we use depending on how long the name is.

Please mention the name or word you would like in the "message to seller" when checking out.

Up to 5  letters fit best in the standard, long box (approx 8"x2" -as shown in "JAYLA" listing photo).

6-8 Letters fit in the wider, rectangle box in two rows (approx 5.5" x 4"). See photo of CAMERON or PENELOPE in the listing for box size.

Due to limited space in the jewelry boxes, any name over 8 letters will be placed in a larger, (third size) 5" x 7" box and finished with the stamped name and rainbow yarn. We do our best to fit everything in the standard two sizes of jewelry boxes, but want to ensure safe shipping and prevent letters from breaking (especially names with letters M,W,N, which are wider).

Our Original Rainbow Crayon® Letters measure approx. 1.5-2", but will vary depending on the actual letter ("M" will be wider than the letter "L" for example)  - Not recommended for children under 4 due to parts that could break off.

Colors for crayons will vary. Please click though photos to see the range of our work. Arrangement of color combinations will differ from set to set with variations of darks and lights. We do our best to accommodate color requests.

Outside yarn/string on the box is typically rainbow colored or red/white combo depending on the time of year and is subject to change.

**We are the Original Rainbow Crayon® shop on Etsy and the first shop to sell a handmade crayon. Thank you for supporting handmade! ***

***Follow our handmade crayon shop on  Instagram (@art2theextreme) for more Christmas gift ideas for kids and packaging examples of both sizes of boxes! **

These leather dopp kits are every bit as great as you could think they are. They are made from distressed top grain cowhide leather, of the best quality. The distressed nature allows it to age beautifully, writing down the life story of it's owner.

The personalization is hot stamped (that's an old school technique and it's hard to do, and it's not laser engraved). Stamped leather smells great, and doesn't have an unpleasant laser burned smell). It's a man against the machine thing, so it's really important.

You can choose to have the dopp kit personalized with a custom name/initials on the outside and/or on the inside, and you can also choose the color of the branding and the personalization strip.

The dopp kits are cut and sewn from the very scratch in a small studio. You receive an object made with warmth and personal care, coming from a small studio, where people laugh, joke, and listen to the good music.

data.description: Start your day with a heartwarming smile and a warm cup of love with our Personalized Pet Drawing Mug. Order now and let us transform your pet's photo into a cherished work of art that will brighten your mornings and warm your heart! If you're interested in ordering a custom pet mug, simply place your order and message me with a clear photo of your dog or cat and I'll take care of the rest. You'll have one-of-a-kind pet mug that not only looks great but also showcases the special bond you have with your pet. HOW TO ORDER 1. Select your Color from the drop-down menu. 2. Choose your size and number of pets. 3. Type in you pets name and the font you would like. ( Default font: Handwriting) 4. Please send a photo after you've made the payment via Etsy messages. 5. Within 24 hours we will send you a high-resolution PNG file as a preview. 6. After your confirmation, we will print it and ship it to your address. PHOTO - GUIDELINES - Select a high-resolution photo of your pet. Photos with your pet sitting up in front of the camera will work great. - Lighting is important. Please send photos that are taken on a sunny day or in a well-lit room. We will need to see the specific details of your pet. - A close-up of your pet sitting or standing is best. This will create a higher quality result compared to your pet lying down. PERSONALIZED PET MUG FEATURES - MICROWAVE-SAFE - Mug can be safely placed in microwave for food or liquid heating. - DISHWASHER-SAFE - Suitable for dishwasher use. - VIBRANT COLORS - The latest printing techniques provide bright and crisp colors. AVAILABLE SIZES - 11 oz - 15 oz - 20 oz RETURN POLICY Unfortunately, since this is a custom pet portrait, we can't offer returns. If there's a production defect, please contact us. ©Printedways / All designs associated with these listings are created by and property of Printedways. Digital files associated with these listings are for personal use only and should not be duplicated or shared in any way

Its versatility allows it to be used as both a cutting board and a decorative piece, making it a practical and stylish addition to any home. The board can be personalized with a custom engraving, transforming it into a unique and thoughtful gift for special occasions. It comes with a variety of design options to choose from, catering to different tastes and preferences.

data.description: Crafted from premium quality 925 Sterling Silver and Durable Steel, these cufflinks offer an exclusive 2mm thickness for superior durability and design. Handmade with meticulous attention to detail, they can be personalized with names, text, letters, numbers, or any other engravings to create a truly unique and meaningful accessory. Choose from Sterling Silver, 18K Gold Filled, or Dark Grey (RHODIUM) finishes to match your personal style and preferences. Packaged in beautifully designed gift boxes, these cufflinks make perfect gifts for special occasions such as weddings, anniversaries, or birthdays.

data.description: This pendant ceramic lamp is a handmade design and a contemporary artwork creation. It is part of the Apilar collection, which is influenced by Spanish ceramics. The lamp has a unique design with nine different shapes that can be stacked on top of each other to create new complex compositions. The lamp also features ceramic prints that are inspired by traditions from different cultures, creating a contemporary cultural collage. The designer is engaged in ongoing research on traditional ceramics as a cultural carrier and is searching for a sense of belonging through the local material culture.

uniqueAttributes.Handmade: This piece was created in the innovative studio of the designer-maker Noa Razer, which is located in Tel Aviv, Israel.
uniqueAttributes.Contemporary artwork: It is part of the Apilar collection, which is a contemporary artwork creation.
uniqueAttributes.Unique design: The Apilar collection began to take shape during a family roots trip to southern Spain, influenced by the differentiated and unique Spanish ceramics. In this collection, there are nine different shapes, from which all structures of the collection are built.
uniqueAttributes.Cultural collage: On top of the pieces are ceramic prints, inspired by traditions from different cultures, creating a contemporary cultural collage.
uniqueAttributes.Ongoing research: The designer is engaged in ongoing research, visual as well as theoretical, focusing on traditional ceramics as a cultural carrier and searching for a sense of belonging through the local material culture.

data.description: Handmade in Tel Aviv, this ceramic lamp has a unique design that combines bare terracotta and glossy ceramic in shades of green with a slight touch of orange-red on top. It is 7.9 inches in height and 7.9 inches in diameter, and comes with a 60-inch golden textile cable and a terracotta 4-inch ceiling rose. It is suitable for standard E27 bulbs, Voltage 110V-250V | 25 to 40W max. Energy-saving LED light bulbs are recommended. This product is made to order by hand and may be slightly different from the one in the photo. Please allow 1-2 weeks production time before shipping.

uniqueAttributes.Handmade: This lamp is made by hand in a small boutique studio in Tel Aviv, making each piece unique. This adds a personal touch and artisanal quality that cannot be replicated by mass-produced items.
uniqueAttributes.Natural materials: The lamp is made from natural terracotta and glossy ceramic, giving it a delicate and homely aesthetic. This sets it apart from generic lamps made from artificial materials.
uniqueAttributes.Unique design: This lamp combines bare terracotta and glossy ceramic in shades of green with a slight touch of orange-red on top. This color combination and design are unique to this lamp and not found in generic counterparts.
uniqueAttributes.Energy-efficient: The lamp is designed to use energy-saving LED light bulbs, making it a more environmentally friendly and cost-effective lighting option.
